mapper.select: SELECT no, resName, resEmail, resPhone, resCapacity, resPrice, checkInDate, startTime, endTime FROM (SELECT *, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), checkInDate) timeDiff FROM rental WHERE place_no = #{param1} AND cancellationDate IS NULL) r WHERE r.timeDiff BETWEEN -32 AND 32 ORDER BY checkInDate ASC, startTime ASC
